default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Are you with those creepy perverts? You better watch out or I'll... Oh, I'm sorry, that was Ray... Did I... Did I do something weird again?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: I hope my acting skills will level up too, so that one day I can play a role that touches people!

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Awesome, let's go kill some more scumbags together!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: New job? Alright, let's give our best!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Phew! Did we do well this time, Chief?

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: No worries, failure is my old friend...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Back off! Don't come close!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: In the end... I can't become...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Have you gotten some rest today? Cramming too much work into your schedule takes a toll on your health.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Sometimes, I'll go ballistic out of the blue, and become so aggressive like I'm a different person. That's because there's another girl inside me, she's... Are you laughing, Chief? I'm serious! I'm not a good enough actress to fool you like that!

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: I'm warning you, keep your distance from me, got it? I'm not Luvia. Don't you get close to me.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Voilà! This is the look I've specifically designed for casting! So... if you were the casting director, would you give me a part?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I want to create a hero who protects the weak and stops darkness. I want... to be somebody's light too. Hehe, I'm only getting small parts now, but I'll keep trying.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I used to think of Ray as a burden, but then I realized, she was in fact my guardian angel! Hehe, to be honest, I like Ray a lot... Shh! We mustn't let her hear it, or she'll call me an idiot again!

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: ...Hey, it's Ray. What are you running from? I'm not here to shock you. Ahem... Because of you, Luvia... has changed a lot. Thanks... I've just come to say that.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Hey you, listen up! In fact, we both... l-like you a lot! Hehe! Can you guess which of us that was?

default.title: Idle
default.text: Ray, listen to me. I'll be sure to protect myself this time. Trust me, okay? Oh come on, don't be mad, pretty please!

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Um... Chief... Please stop... Please don't... Ah!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Wanna join us? Of course, I'm glad to have someone to talk to. Actually, Ray is pleased too. She's just too shy to let you know!

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Yay, I can make it to the new series' casting too! Love you, Chief!

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Sigh, I failed at the casting again. But I did finish the task you gave me!

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Whoa! You hear that? That's quite dangerous!

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Hehe, Luvia Ray is here to conquer you!

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Oh... Stop it, Chief... You're messing up my hair...

glittering_stars.title: Level Up
glittering_stars.text: Ha-ppy holi-days! Hmm... My body language in front of the camera needs more work...

glittering_stars.title: Obtain Attire
glittering_stars.text: "Luvia Ray, the symbol of happiness on a snowy night, makes her grand appearance. Remember to hang your stocking by your bed! Otherwise, you won't get any presents..."

glittering_stars.title: Greeting
glittering_stars.text: Chief, the holiday-themed studio is super well-equipped, isn't it? Ah... Careful! If you damage the equipment... the Bureau's budget will be at risk.

glittering_stars.title: Ordinary Contact 1
glittering_stars.text: Sigh... I honestly don't get what's so nice about this outfit. It's so hard to move around in this... Change it? No way. I'm gonna respect Luvia's decision.

glittering_stars.title: Ordinary Contact 2
glittering_stars.text: This is a cool role! Working hard discreetly to be a guardian of others' wishes... I've made up my mind! I'll come back here to shoot more films next year! But next time we'll be playing the main role!

glittering_stars.title: Idle
glittering_stars.text: ♪Chief, can you stay with me for a bit longer? I want to enjoy tonight's view with you!

glittering_stars.title: Annoyed
glittering_stars.text: Luvia said don't just shake hands with anyone in studios. But if it's you... it's fine.

glittering_stars.title: Special Attention
glittering_stars.text: Eh, Chief! Quit staring at me, watch the movie! I know, I know, I only played a supporting role... but I gave a mind-blowing performance during the shooting!

beach_frolic.title: Level Up
beach_frolic.text: Ahh, it's boiling... Let's have a water fight, Chief! That'll cool us down.

beach_frolic.title: Obtain Attire
beach_frolic.text: "You heartless demon in a gray trench coat... You haven't played with this Luvia Ray for five whole hours! Accept your punishment. Take this, high-pressure water gun!" How was that performance? Much more like a blockbuster heroine, am I not?

beach_frolic.title: Greeting
beach_frolic.text: Ha! The other protagonist has finally arrived! Now we can start shooting the first scene of the first act of Summertime Heartbeat. Eh? What? You're not ready? Mmm~ Chief, don't tell me you haven't learned your lines by heart yet.

beach_frolic.title: Ordinary Contact 1
beach_frolic.text: Why do I look a bit upset? I'm not. It's just that I'm worried my wet clothes might get in the way while I'm fighting.

beach_frolic.title: Ordinary Contact 2
beach_frolic.text: Chief, what do you think of this summer? Are you having fun? Hehe... Not only did I finally get to come to the beach that I've only heard of, I had many more of my wishes fulfilled as well! For Luvia Ray, this is the best summer ever!

beach_frolic.title: Idle
beach_frolic.text: Does anyone else want to join the water fight? Jump in now, and you'll get a Polaroid photo with me—a movie star in the making!

beach_frolic.title: Annoyed
beach_frolic.text: I hope you did not forget that water conducts electricity.

beach_frolic.title: Special Attention
beach_frolic.text: Ahhh... I'm so sorry, Chief. I got your clothes all wet. Y-you kept staring at me; it made me nervous, and m-my hand was slippery with sweat...
